**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title**
Contaminated Sites and Environmental Compliance Consulting Services

**Reference Number**
PW-22-01017374

**Description**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites consulting firms to submit abbreviated proposals for the establishment of a Source List (SL) to provide Contaminated Sites and Environmental Compliance Consulting Services. The services will be required on an "as and when" basis to support the Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in Nunavut.

**Bid Closing Date**
The bid closing date is January 23, 2023 at 13:00 Eastern Time.

**Source List Details**

* The SL will be established for a period of one (1) year.
* The maximum estimated value of the SL is $2,000,000.00.
* Commissions under the SL are expected to be valued between $200,000.00 and $500,000.00.

**Eligibility**
Firms that are qualified to provide these services and are registered and in good standing with the Inuit Firm Registry are eligible to bid. Canada's free trade agreements do not pose any impediment to the inclusion of measures favorable to Indigenous Peoples and businesses in this procurement.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Inuit and Nunavut benefits for Inuit employment
* Inuit training and skills development
* Subcontracting to Inuit firms
* The location of offices/facilities in the Nunavut Settlement Area

**Submission Instructions**
Firms that are interested in submitting a proposal can do so through the MERX Electronic Bidding System. Proposals must be submitted on or before the bid closing date.

**Contact Information**
For further information, please contact Steve Kennedy at Defence Construction Canada at 613-769-2659 or [steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca).
